sentences: Meil algab nädal esmaspäevaga ja lõpeb pühapäevaga.
Ta käib mul iga nädal või vähemalt üle nädala külas.
context: The word 'nädal' in Estonian refers to a week, specifically the seven-day period from Monday to Sunday. It can also refer to any seven-day period starting from a particular day or a special period dedicated to something specific. The word is commonly used to talk about time periods, schedules, and recurring events that happen on a weekly basis.
